title: Week 7 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Super Yeti - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/19
description:
Week 7 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 7 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping for each position, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 19th, 2021.
  
 (03:00) - Monday Night Recap: Bills at Titans
 (09:30) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (17:00) - NFL News
 (26:35) - Week 7 Waivers
 (28:00) - WR Waivers
 (39:20) - RB Waivers
 (50:00) - TE Waivers
 (55:05) - DST Streamers
 (55:40) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

 Support this podcast
